about_the_game:
A classic action adventure shooter, featuring the blonde bounty hunter Ava Garant versus a horde of super Orcs and their army of the undead:

- A new generation of Orc warriors

- Their army of dragons, demons and the undead

- A badass blonde bounty hunter

- Melee, spell casting and shooting combat

Key Features:

ORCS, VAMPIRES, DEMONS AND MORE

The bounty hunters have been getting reports and rumors of bizarre and fearsome creatures roaming the islands. They include visions of dragons, giants and animals never seen before. Whatever’s there, its worth the risk for an Orc bounty.

Demon spirits - malevolent entities believed to possess supernatural powers

The world of sun demons where chaos and suffering reign supreme

Infernal knights - formidable warriors of the demonic realm

Fight against brutish Orcs with skin as thick as armour

THIRD PERSON ACTION ADVENTURE

You must use a combination of stealth, speed, and stamina to explore each Orc stronghold. Mixing classic third person shooting gameplay with enhanced 3D platformer mechanics, fluid and fast movement is crucial to your success.

STUNNING LANDSCAPES AND ENVIRONMENTS

The islands consist of lush jungle forests, desolate military bases and ancient ruins of an unknown civilization. Navigate your way through this the challenging and complex landscape to find the island’s hidden secrets. You will need to constantly scan your surroundings and work out how to gain access to structures and mysterious relics on the islands.

THIRD PERSON SHOOTING, MAGIC AND MELEE COMBAT

You will have access to a large arsenal of specialized arms and fantasy weapons. Starting with your bare fists, you will need to search the island for additional weaponry that has been hidden. Knives, swords, rifles, pistols, powerful spells and more will all be at your disposal… if you can find them.

BACKGROUND

They always exited. Before human time could be measured, Orcs thrived in the darkness. Led astray by the Dark Lords in the genesis wars, they survived the centuries by becoming independent.

Unseen and undetectable, they grew in strength, joining forces with demons and the undead. Cloaked by mystical screens, they were protected from humans and their mechanized armies.

Aware of the their growing ethereal abilities, the kingdoms of man declared Orcs and their rogue spirts as outlaws. Orcs were hunted by the Protectorate, an ancient order of hunters. Only Protectorate bounty hunters could enter the cloaked Orc strongholds

Ava Garand leads the last remaining bounty unit.

content_descriptors.notes: As a 3D shooting game, it contains imagery and animations of human characters getting harmed and shot. Though not realistic violence (compared to movies), it would not be suitable for children or any other young person who has not played similar games. An equivalent movie rating would be PG13.
